Report Contents.Issue: Storage account 'exampleStorageAccount' allows public blob access.
Report Contents.Remediation: Disable public blob access for this storage account.

Report Contents.Issue: Storage account 'exampleStorageAccount' does not have default blob encryption enabled.
Report Contents.Remediation: Enable default encryption on the blob service.

Report Contents.Issue: SQL Database 'exampleDatabase' on server 'exampleServer' does not have Transparent Data Encryption enabled.
Report Contents.Remediation: Enable Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) for this database.

Report Contents.Issue: SQL Database 'exampleDatabase' on server 'exampleServer' has short backup retention period.
Report Contents.Remediation: Increase backup retention period to at least 7 days.

Report Contents.Issue: Virtual Machine 'exampleVM' has an unencrypted disk 'exampleDisk'.
Report Contents.Remediation: Enable encryption on the virtual machine's disks.

Report Contents.Issue: Network Security Group 'exampleNSG' has an overly permissive rule 'rule1'.
Report Contents.Remediation: Restrict the rule to specific IP ranges and/or specific ports.
Investigate and address the unauthorized access attempts.

Report Contents.Issue: Role with potentially excessive permissions found: Owner
Report Contents.Remediation: Review and possibly reduce the level of permissions.
Review management console activities for any unauthorized or suspicious actions.

Report Contents.Issue: Overly permissive rule found in NSG exampleNSG
Report Contents.Remediation: Restrict the rule to specific IP ranges and specific ports.

Report Contents.Issue: Public access allowed in storage account: exampleStorageAccount
Report Contents.Remediation: Disable public access on storage accounts to protect data.
